article.title: AMERICOM Government Services Wins Contract to Support U.S. Army's TROJAN Network
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: AMERICOM Government Services has won a five-year, $136.2 million follow-on contract to support the U.S. Army's TROJAN Network. The contract includes five additional one-year options worth $150.2 million, making a total potential contract value of $286.5 million over 10 years.
